teachings.title: Created in His Image
teachings.content_md:
## Overview
We are made in His image for wise dominion and stewardship.

*“Let us make mankind in our image…”* (Genesis 1:26-28)

teachings.title: Origin Words
teachings.content_md:
## Origin and Speech
Word precedes world; alignment precedes assignment.

*“In the beginning was the Word…”* (John 1:1-5)

teachings.title: Now Word — Aug 23, 2025
teachings.content_md:
**Now Word:** Stand firm at the gates; what was hidden will be revealed.

**Confession:** *I stand, I occupy, I advance by His word.*
